text: Vice and Virtue (original French title: Le Vice et la Vertu) is a 1963 French Italian World War II movie directed by Roger Vadim and starring Annie Girardot, Robert Hossein, Catherine Deneuve, Philippe Lemaire, Luciana Paluzzi, Valeria Ciangottini, Jean-Daniel Simon. ==Other websites== * Category:1963 war movies Category:French movies Category:Italian movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Roger Vadim
title: Vice and Virtue
